subject: Soccer
Women's World Cup (Soccer)
organizations: United States Women's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: The last American women’s team to win the World Cup was the '99 team, and for an entire generation, it defined what women’s sports should be and could be.
snippet: The last American women’s team to win the World Cup was the '99 team, and for an entire generation, it defined what women’s sports should be and could be.
